jserror.title: Unexpected error occurred
jserror.message: We have reported this to our team! Please close the app and start again!

errors.loginError: There was an error in the login, repeat the procedure.
errors.profileUpdateError: An error occurred while updating your profile.

inbox.enableCallToActionDescription: Enable the inbox to view messages

spid.selectIdp: To continue to login, select your SPID identity provider
spid.selectDemoIdp: If you do not have your own SPID identity yet, browse the app in demo mode

loginErrorAlert.title: Login error
loginErrorAlert.message: Sorry, there was an error while logging in, could you try again?

subscription.line1: SPID è l'identità digitale per accedere ai servizi online della Pubblica Amministrazione Italiana.
subscription.line2: Inserisci la tua e-mail per attivarla.

landing.nospid: Don't have SPID? Find out more

spid_information_request.paragraph1: SPID, the Public System of Digital Identity, allows you to access all the services of the Public Administration with a single Digital Identity (username and password).
spid_information_request.paragraph2: If you like, leave us your email address to receive reminders and updates on this app
spid_information_request.paragraph3: Continuing you declare to accept the
spid_information_request.tosLinkText: rules on the processing of personal data

tos.contentTitle: Terms of service and personal data
tos.section1: Terms and conditions of use of the service
tos.section2: Rules on the processing of personal data

pin.pinInfo: This code will be requested each time you open the app and when you need to view sensitive data or make disposable transactions. It must be composed of 5 digits. Remember it carefully. You can change it at any time by entering with SPID.
pin.confirmInvalid: the two pins do not match
